cards.title: July Revolution 1830
cards.claim: The July Revolution in 1830 led to the abdication of Charles X and brought Louis-Philippe of the House of Orleans to the throne as "King of the French."

cards.title: House of Orleans
cards.claim: Louis-Philippe belonged to the Orleans branch of the Bourbon family.

cards.title: July Monarchy
cards.claim: His reign from 1830 to 1848 is known as the July Monarchy and leaned on a constitutional framework and a bourgeois political base.

cards.title: Abdication 1848
cards.claim: He abdicated during the 1848 Revolution and went into exile in Britain.

cards.title: Citizen King
cards.claim: He cultivated the image of a "Citizen King" and was often associated with the tricolor flag.

cards.title: Economic change
cards.claim: The period saw railway expansion and industrial growth in France.
